data.message: hi coca cola i was wondering if you would mind explaining to people why your using a coluring in your products that is VERY well known for causing cancer Source: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-2164635/Calls-ban-Coca-Cola-colouring-linked-cancer.html

replies.message: The daily mail isn't a reliable source.
Richard Westmoreland oh right ok how many sources do you want three five or ten  your choice tell me how many and ill get every single one of them you mark my words
Daniel Wickham A source that isn't from the Daily Mail, a newspaper so toxic that not even LEGO will advertise in it.
